title: De Brabantse Folklore
additional-notes: This is a Belgian publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
This is the record for the Dutch-language version of the serial.  The French-language version was published as 'Le Folklore Brabançon'.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Erica Lu for copyright research on this title.
